attributes.action: reprimand Sammy Wilson MP for his recent inexcusable ban of climate change advertisements, and urge the N.I. Assembly to reallocate his role as N.I. Environment Minister to someone more qualified/ interested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sammy Wilson has proven time and time again that he is unqualified and ignorant of environmental issues, helping to make N. Ireland a laughing stock.  How this man was given such a vital role is beyond comprehension.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
